SEARCH
Package org.javamale.ectotext.common.model

Class Character.CharacterBuilder

java.lang.Object
org.javamale.ectotext.common.model.Character.CharacterBuilder
Enclosing class:
Character
public static class Character.CharacterBuilder extends Object
Builder per costruire in modo fluente un Character.

Esempio d’uso: 


 Character hero = new Character.CharacterBuilder("hero")
         .setDisplayName("Eroe")
         .setStartingRoom(startRoom)
         .addItems(sword, shield)
         .build();

  • Method Details

    • build

      public Character build()
      Costruisce il Character verificando che i campi obbligatori displayName e startingRoom siano stati impostati.
      Returns:
      nuova istanza di Character
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - se display name o starting room sono null
